title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Fort Scott National Historic Site Vintage Baseball      Location: Fort Scott National Historic Site     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Come to Fort Scott National Historic Site for some old-fashioned fun! Relive the earliest days of America’s pastime by cheering on your favorite vintage baseball team as they battle it out on the diamond.  View Details      Fort Scott National Historic Site Labor Day Weekend      Location: Fort Scott NHS     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Features talks, tours, demonstrations, and living history programs about Fort Scott's role in the pivotal events of American History in the place where it happened. View Details      Fort Scott National Historic Site Symbols of Sacrifice      Location: Fort Scott NHS     Friday, September 9, 2016 Parade Ground Flags remember our nation's war dead. Walk Among the Field of Honor and reflect upon their ultimate sacrifice to safeguard our freedoms. View Details                   Click on image to visit the main NPS Centennial Page    Fort Scott National Historic Site has many exciting, educational, and entertaining events planned for the NPS Centennial in 2016. The entire year's calendar of events can be seen by doing a search for events from January 1, 2016 to December 31, 2016, Come visit us and celebrate 100 years of America's best idea.       Print a 2016 schedule of events!
